For as long as I can remember, I've hated myself.

Shows progress to take responsibility for your actions.

translation.en: I just forgot to stop.
I do feel ashamed.
Spent so long feeling resentful for things that just don't matter.

translation.en: Maybe I should've tried to be more ordinary.
translation.es: Tal vez debí intentar ser más corriente.

translation.en: Hello, Nan.
You was never ordinary.
Look at you.
In here, talking about your feelings.
What a waste of time.
Mum, I know it was never easy.
translation.es: Mamá, yo sé que nunca fue fácil.

translation.en: And I hope you can forgive me.
Because I've realized that's what we need to do now.
translation.es: Comprendo que es lo que debemos hacer ahora.

translation.en: Forgive each other.
- No, your problem is you're selfish. - No.
translation.es: - Tu problema es que eres egoísta. - No.

translation.en: My problem was I believed you loved me.
translation.es: Mi problema fue haber creído que me amabas.

translation.en: And you're incapable of it.
I gave everything to keep something that I never even had in the first place.
translation.es: Di todo por mantener algo que jamás tuve realmente.

translation.en: I always thought you was an introverted extrovert.
translation.es: Siempre te consideré un extrovertido introvertido.

translation.en: A what? He's shy. He's always been shy.
translation.es: - ¿Un qué? - Es tímido. Siempre lo fue.

translation.en: It's all his father's fault.
Don't blame me. He'd have been strange, regardless.
translation.es: No me culpes. Él siempre fue extraño.

translation.en: Actually, I think I'm okay with strange.
God. Not him.
Both of you. Stop.
I'm not going to allow you to talk to me like this anymore.
translation.es: No permitiré que me sigan hablando así.

translation.en: It's about time you said that.
translation.es: Ya era hora de que lo dijeras.

translation.en: I never told you how much I need you.
translation.es: Jamás te dije cuánto te necesito.

translation.en: No, no, no, I love you, man.
Always have, always will.
You write songs that millions of people love.
translation.es: Escribes canciones que millones de personas aman.

translation.en: And that's what's important.
You just need to remember who you are…

translation.en: and be okay with it.
He doesn't know who he is.
Yes, I do.
I'm Elton Hercules John.
I thought you were Reggie Dwight.
I haven't been Reggie Dwight for years.
translation.es: Hace años que no soy Reggie Dwight.

translation.en: When are you going to hug me?

Good to see you.

- No. - No?

You're not scared you're not good without it,
you're scared to feel again.

Don't go.
Not yet.
This is the part you gotta do on your own.
translation.es: Esta es la parte que tienes que hacer solo.

Thank you, Bernie.
You're my brother.
